AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' -- 판매중
AND TP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' -- 노출 여부 AND P2.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = 'PD002501' -- 채널 AND P.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = 'PD002502' -- 에피소드
AND P.META_CLSF_CD = #{productBasicInfo.metaClsfCd} -- 통합 뮤직
AND CPM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- INPUT PARAMETER -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
AND CP.PROD_ID = #{productBasicInfo.prodId}
AND CP.PART_PROD_ID = #{productBasicInfo.partProdId}
AND P.TOP_MENU_ID = #{productBasicInfo.topMenuId} AND PI.IMG_CD = #{imageCd} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantHeader.tenantId} AND PD.LANG_CD = #{tenantHeader.langCd} AND CD.LANG_CD = #{tenantHeader.langCd} AND ROWNUM = 1
